about.title: iOS Developer & AI Enthusiast
about.description: iOS Developer with expertise in Swift and Objective-C. Passionate about AI research and machine learning integration in mobile applications. I enjoy creating innovative solutions that bridge technology with real-world problems.

Expert in Swift, Objective-C and iOS ecosystem
AI/ML integration with Python, TensorFlow, OpenCV
